tasks.task: Design and develop a sustainable polydome agricultural system.
subtasks: Research agricultural products and their resource preferences.
Layer hydroponic and soil-based crop production.
Co-locate crops and animals for beneficial material flows.
Create internal logistics systems for harvest and processing.
Produce high-value niche products for local sale.
Improve livelihoods for workers, farmers, and consumers.

tasks.task: Publish research findings for public use.
subtasks: Distribute the open-source research document.
Seek partnerships to build a Polydome pilot.

tasks.task: Advocate for a diverse and distributed agricultural system.
subtasks: Engage with potential partners and supporters.
Share the vision through website addresses provided.
